name: VisualDNAShops
author: Imagini Holdings Ltd.

sections.description:
Adds a customizable widget that shows a Visual DNA Shop. It allows you to change the VDNA Shop ID and to switch between your shops.
You can create your own shops at http://shops.visualdna.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the visualdna-shops directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Don’t forget to add the necessary access writes to visualdna-shops directory and its content.

  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  4. Add the widget to a dynamic sidebar.
sections.faq:
Q. How can I use it ?

A. Go to http://shops.visualdna.com/, get yourself a shop with your favorites products(e.g. from Amazon.com) and we will create your shop and give you the shop ID.
When you have the shop ID you can add it to this plugin and your shop will be displayed on your wordpress sidebar.

short_description: Displays your Visual DNA shop on your wordpress blog
